devices.name: wan
devices.post_cmd_host: sudo ip link set netns $(docker inspect --format '{{.State.Pid}}' wan) dev enx00249b14dc6e
devices.post_cmd: ip link set enx00249b14dc6e name eth1
devices.cleanup_cmd: docker stop wan; docker rm wan; sudo ip link set dev enx00249b14dc6e down

devices.name: lan
devices.post_cmd_host: sudo ip link set netns $(docker inspect --format '{{.State.Pid}}' lan) dev enxc05627904e8c
devices.post_cmd: ip link set enxc05627904e8c name eth1
devices.cleanup_cmd: docker stop lan; docker rm lan; sudo ip link set dev enxc05627904e8c down

rpi3-1.notes: Rpi3 device with docker containers attached to WAN/LAN

qemux86-1.conn_cmd: sudo qemu-system-i386 -m 256 -nographic --enable-kvm -netdev tap,id=wan,ifname=${wan_iface} -device e1000,netdev=wan -netdev tap,id=lan,ifname=${lan_iface} -device e1000,netdev=lan

devices.post_cmd_host: sudo ip link set netns $(docker inspect --format '{{.State.Pid}}' wan-${uniq_id}) dev ${wan_iface}
devices.cleanup_cmd: docker stop wan-${uniq_id}; docker rm wan-${uniq_id}

devices.cleanup_cmd: docker stop lan-${uniq_id}; docker rm lan-${uniq_id}
